items.question: What is the difference between ScraperLayer and other scraping services?
items.answer: ScraperLayer offers better pricing, more reliable infrastructure, and simpler integration compared to other services. We focus on making web scraping as simple as possible while maintaining high performance and reliability.

items.question: Do you support JavaScript rendering?
items.answer: Yes, we support full JavaScript rendering for dynamic websites. Our infrastructure can handle complex SPAs and websites that require JavaScript to load content.

items.question: What are your rate limits?
items.answer: Rate limits depend on your plan. Free tier allows 100 requests per month, Pro plan allows 10,000 requests per month, and Business plan has custom limits based on your needs.

items.question: How do you handle IP blocking?
items.answer: We use a distributed network of IPs and automatic rotation to avoid blocking. Our system also includes geographic distribution and smart retry mechanisms.

items.question: Can I scrape any website?
items.answer: We can scrape most public websites, but we respect robots.txt files and rate limits. We don't support scraping of private or password-protected content.

items.question: What data formats do you support?
items.answer: We return data in JSON format by default, but we also support CSV and XML exports. You can specify the format in your API request.
